```{r}
#| output: false

library(readxl)
library(knitr)
youth_climate_metadata <- read_excel("youth-climate.xlsx")
opts <- options(knitr.kable.NA = "")
```

## Citation Metadata

```{r}
#| output: asis

citation_metadata <- youth_climate_metadata[2:24, ]
kable(citation_metadata, col.names = NULL)
```
